mClothesData.title: Seam Free Long Sleeve Training Top
mClothesData.desc: Hit the gym in style and comfort with this training top from the Goodmove collection. It has a slim-fit cut that is seam-free for a streamlined shape. Long raglan-style sleeves and a crew neck create a classic look. Reflective detailing and a Goodmove logo make it ideal for exercising outdoors in the evening. The fabric has a Life Natural™ antibacterial peppermint oil finish and Cool Comfort™ technology for extra freshness. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying and breathable fabric keeps you cool and dry. Made with recycled polyester.
